item.description:
TodayCloudy. Showers and thunderstorms likely...mainly this morning. Patchy fog this morning. Some thunderstorms may produce gusty winds...small hail and frequent lightning. Highs in the lower 80s. Southwest winds 10 to 15 mph. Gusts up to 25 mph this afternoon. Chance of rain 60 percent.

Ok I think that I need to cancel again. Sorry for the inconvenience. I will try and see if I can do it again in two weeks.

Regards

Kate
item.name: Ride through Gloucester and Rockport
